course.subject: TEMG
course.name: T&M Professional Activities
course.description: A compulsory course for students enrolling in the Dual Degree Program in Technology and Management throughout their five years of study. This course is designed to provide academic advising to students, to enhance their personal and professional skills, to improve their understanding of latest business and technology development and to improve their communication skills. Activities involve executive forums, workshops and mentoring program. Graded P or F.

reviews.author: Ringo ng 18
reviews.title: It is actually a course that lasts for 5 years

reviews.comment_teaching:
the guest speakers and Alumni usually perform very well in the talks

others are just gatherings, just chill and enjoy
reviews.comment_grading:
make sure you attend every event, it is pass or fail course

100% attendance of training(s) and workshop(s) of the year throughout 5 years (Excluding exchange/ leave period);
100% attendance of Executive Forum throughout 5 years (Excluding exchange/ leave period);
100% attendance of 15-minute meeting with faculty throughout 5 years (Excluding exchange/ leave period);
100% attendance of Annual Gathering throughout 5 years (Excluding exchange/ leave period);
100% attendance of Alumni Sharing if any, throughout 5 years (Excluding exchange/ leave period
reviews.comment_workload: ~15 hours, for year 1 students, they have a survival camp, others may have workshops , hence the total workload varies
